title: Intoxicated Friends - Novel Updates
tags: College/University   Family Business   Modern Day   Straight Seme   Straight Uke
author: Ye Shu Ying   叶疏影
description:
Young Master Su and People's Hero Yao are both well known in F University, but their areas of expertise differ.

When they first met, they each discovered that the other was very different than what rumors made him out to be. Young Master Su was not as perfect as they said, and People's Hero Yao was not as impulsive. At the time, neither of them expected their entanglement to stretch from the schoolyard all the way to the business world.

In this unexpected love, who has conquered whom?>
